alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 12:10PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with torrential rainfall and minor flooding in western Massachusetts... At 1208 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking several thunderstorms along a line extending from near Colrain southward to Blandford. These storms were moving slowly northeast at 10 mph, and producing localized torrential downpours. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Chicopee, Westfield, Holyoke, Amherst, Northampton, Agawam, West Springfield, Greenfield, Deerfield, South Hadley, Easthampton, Southwick, Montague, Southampton, Hadley, Sunderland, Hatfield, Northfield, Williamsburg and Huntington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
